hackathon-description-text: Update 12/2: We heard feedback loud and clear from the developer community on the Salesforce1 Hackathon we ran at Dreamforce.  We take feedback seriously and, as a result, our internal audit team conducted a comprehensive review of the eligibility requirements and judging process.  We want to discuss all of the issues transparently, explain how we made some key decisions, and share the results of the review. Please read more here:
hackathon-eligibility:
You are eligible to participate in and enter the
You must
hackathon-requirements: Build the most amazing mobile application using Salesforce Platform. Your submission must include:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: This is it - the largest single hackathon prize in history. One winner will walk away with a cool million dollars. Not equity. Not investment. CASH.
This $25,000 prize will be paid out in the form of American Express gift cards. For each team member!
This $10,000 prize will be paid out in the form of American Express gift cards. For each team member!
This $5,000 prize will be paid out in the form of American Express gift cards. For each team member!

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is it an amazing new scenario?
Does the application create value? Does it save money, create opportunity, connect customers, partners, and employees?
Does the app have a user interface that is gorgeous, easy to use, and fast?
Does the application take advantage of the features and capabilities of the Salesforce Platform?

hackathon-description-header: Salesforce is challenging you to build next generation mobile apps in a $1 million hackathon.
